channel.title: Ted Opitz
channel.description: Recent news about Ted Opitz, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Proud to speak at the Ukrainian Heritage Day Celebration at Queen's Park with @MPWLizon and @DonnaCansfield http://t.co/h3DpeYDXb3

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Great to join @HonJohnBaird, @btrottier & @BobDechert at the Ukrainian Independence Day celebrations in #Etobicoke. http://t.co/Dr7wMkgj5x

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Had round table discussion with @MinPeterMacKay in #Etobicoke discussing justice issues. http://t.co/1U6EmWY1KC

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Was happy to attend IFTAR dinner during the Ramadan season hosted by the Ukrainian Community Center. http://t.co/PloMVBWi8x

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Wishing a peaceful month of Ramadan to all Muslims in Etobicoke Centre embarking on this important time of devotion and reflection.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Heartened by resilience of #Etobicoke residents affected by the storm. Crews are doing their best to restore power asap.
